Author: Stoyan Chalakov (MVP and Senior IT Consultant at POHN IT-Consulting GmbH)

ConfigurationOptions.Summary: A necessary minimum regarding the monitoring of Active Directory Directory Services in organizations of any scale. All critical components are covered.
Building on essentials with important performance/availability monitors, and alert generating/performance collection rules. Covers all major components.
Building on the balanced level this tuning level increases performance metrics collected, allowing Subject Matter Experts to troubleshoot problems in depth.
Building on the Enhanced level this tuning level adds special case performance collection that should only be required in exceptional circumstances. Please enable with caution.

Description: The tuning pack offers pre-defined monitornig levels for Windows Server 2016 and newer based Active Directory domain controllers.
